text: Payback was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the WWE. It was held on June 16, 2013 at the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the first Payback event held by the WWE. It replaced the No Way Out pay-per-view. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Payback Kickoff (Pre-show) Sheamus defeated Damien Sandow Singles match 10:25 1 Curtis Axel (with Paul Heyman) defeated Wade Barrett (c) and The Miz Triple threat match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 17:08 2 AJ Lee (with Big E Langston) defeated Kaitlyn (c) by submission Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 09:54 3 Dean Ambrose (c) defeated Kane by countout Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 9:33 4 Alberto Del Rio (with Ricardo Rodriguez) defeated Dolph Ziggler (c) (with AJ Lee and Big E Langston) Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 13:46 5 CM Punk (with Paul Heyman) defeated Chris Jericho Singles match 21:19 6 The Shield (Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins) (c) defeated Daniel Bryan and Randy Orton Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 12:07 7 John Cena (c) defeated Ryback 3 Stages of Hell match for the WWE Championship (Stage 1: Lumberjack match (winner = Ryback) Stage 2: Tables match (winner = Cena) Stage 3: Ambulance match (winner = Cena)) 24:40 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Payback website Category:2013 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Payback Category:2013 in Illinois Category:June 2013 events
title: Payback (2013)
